messages.content: Show me an overview of all active campaigns

### üö® Campaigns Needing Attention

**1. Apex Motors** (Poor Health)
- Behind pacing with only 65% of budget spent
- Very low CTR (0.12%) - creative needs review
- Germany performing poorly (0.04% CTR)
- Mobile CTR (0.08%) much worse than desktop (0.18%)

**2. TechFlow SaaS** (Warning - Overspending)
- Already spent $28,200 of $25,000 budget (113%)
- Need to implement daily caps or reduce bids
- Good CTR (0.60%) shows strong engagement

---

### ‚úÖ High Performers

- **SportMax Apparel**: Excellent all-around performance with 85% video completion rate
- **GreenEnergy Co**: Efficient CPA at $266, California leading at 0.40% CTR
- **FinanceFirst Bank**: Strong 0.85 viewability, good desktop performance

---

**Total Combined:**
- Budget: $170,000
- Spend: $127,450 (75%)
- Total Conversions: 353
